messages.content: show me all the chords in guitar tab for the lydian mode

Here you go :

First chord : i chord
Second chord : IV chord
Third chord : vi chord

Fouth chord : V chord
Fifth chord : vii chord
Sixth chord : IV7 chord
Seventh chord : I7 chord

The scale of lydian mode is : I, IV, V, vi, IV, I
show this in guitar tablature format

Here you go :

First chord : i
Second chord : IV
Third chord : vi

Fouth chord : V
Fifth chord : vii
Sixth chord : IV7
Seventh chord : I7
